home.subtitle1: Can we heal the Earth together?
home.paragraph1: Raptor Finance is a decentralized, financial ecosystem designed by holders for holders. Our mission is to heal planet Earth together and fight climate change! We achieve this by donating to community-chosen projects that help prevent climate change. There is no planet B, therefore we need to work together to help save Mother Earth!
home.paragraph2: You can help us saving the earth by donating to the official Raptor community donation wallet. The balance of this wallet will be gradually donated to environmental charities starting Q4/2021. Please check our
home.paragraph3: This is our only donation wallet address:
home.paragraph4_2: in our wallet to be donated!

staking.paragraph1: Using Raptor staking, you can easily earn more Raptor tokens over time while the blockchain is running. Planning to hold Raptor tokens to help our planet? Earn more while doing so and collect your passive income.

staking.paragraph2_2: Switch to the Binance Smart Chain

lottery.paragraph1: This is a simple, non-custodial proof-of-work random number generation lottery for Raptor. You have the chance to win Raptor tokens by buying tickets with Raptor tokens.
